phrases: That person is the Master's grandson?
Looks like this guy totally wiped the floor with all of ya.
Came to visit the founder's grave.
I used to be in Fairy Tail, if you remember.
I came here to visit Mavis's grave.
Since you are here and all, maybe I will make you a grave, too!
Never thought the boy would have such a stuck-up grandkid.
To think the boy had someone other than Gildarts at this level.
It do not matter how strong the guy is.
What is more important is standing up to him.
Sounds like the excuse of a weakling to me.
You have had a chance to warm up, yes?
If there is even a small gap in the defensive runes, they lose all purpose.
It is crucial they are precise.
Make sure to check the fine details as you fill them in.
This time, I will protect you, Gajeel.
If you have something to say, then say it loud and clear.
You should really lie down again, Elf-niichan.
I could at least stand watch...
You were crying out in your sleep, Elf-niichan.
Man, you guys are sure takin' it easy.
And where the hell were you?
I got rid of the glasses guy who was out for the count.
If he had some kind of Body Link, he would have given away our position.
You have taken some damage, too.
Maybe you could rest a bit?
When I think about how they got to feel, invading enemy territory, this are not nothing.
Looks like we have already been traced.
These guys should have been defeated by Gajeel!
Though I lost my sword, that does not change the manner of my battle!
Master Hades will be angry if we stay defeated!
Thanks to all the damage you guys have done...
we will definitely get promoted into the 7 Kin of Purgatory-pero!
We have to restore the runes, first!
How long are you going to stay down?
That is'because I have already Self-Strengthened.
But I thought Happy stole that doll!
I have a spare, of course!
Plus, I have not missed a beat and I already stole one of you guys' hairs.
Do not go freaking out just yet.
I can learn from my past losses at battle.
Change Mr. 2 to be made of iron!
Now then, if you want to get back together with me, you just need to say so.
Oh, such beautiful love between brother and sister!
A lot of girls tell me they want to be my little sister.
Yes, I am one of the 7 Kin of Purgatory.
But I will still use my full strength to destroy weaklings like you.
Man, Romeo has not come back yet?
He is tagging along with Al and Bisca on a job.
They better not have ditched him and started makin' out or something!
We have got more people than ever.
Well, cannot say I am surprised.
We are getting more famous, and the number of jobs we have got has increased correspondingly.
Just look at all these requests!
Like it matters to you, Mr. I Never Go on a Job.
For I have completed a new dance!
I name it, the Dance of Greatest Power!
I can eat all I want and stay thin!
Laki, how long has it been?
I had a bunch of long-term jobs in a row.
You keep pigging out like that, and you are going to get like Reedus!
I am large because of magic, that is all.
Lately you keep going on every job you can!
Well, he is a wizard's son, all right!
Although he do not take after his dad, that is for sure.
It is boring without Natsu-nii and the others.
You want to become like Natsu, do not you, Romeo?
But without them, no matter how many people are in the guild...
S Class wizards, the strongest team... Dragon Slayers...
They are now the top in Fiore, are not they?
I wonder if there is some job that only I can do?
That is perfect for me, up there?
How about you choose one of the ones you are staring at, first!
How many years have you been standing there?
I wonder how it is going?
All of them are really great this year.
By the way, why did Wendy go?
She was someone is partner, right?
Forgotten who the candidates were again?
You think Natsu-nii can become S Class?
When I grow up, I am going to become an S Class wizard for sure!
You would better become a wizard first!
We are not going to get anywhere searching all together.
Let us split up and search.
I am not scared... I am not scared...
Let us all move further on.
You can take a hit, I will give you that.
We would not be Grimoire Heart if we did not pay you back tenfold for what you did to us!
Soon, we will finish you off!
You busted up the exam, hurt my friends...
You targeted wounded who could not move!
We are the ones who got to pay you back, big time!
I have completed a minimal defense.
But the next step is eliminating these two.
You are not in the leadership, but you did manage to injure Gajeel that severely...
The two of them attack together...
The way to fight a wizard that changes their element back and forth is to work as a team!
You might not be a match alone, but together there is a chance!
I have a bad feeling about this!
Those who are hit by it lose all power in their limbs,
and it is impossible for them to move at all.
Even if you defend against it, your magic power will be wiped out.
That power was just from one leg.
I have my head, and my entire body.
If I attack with all of them at once, we are not talkin' two or three times stronger...
Is this the confidence of youth?
But youth is not what is needed to walk the path of magic!
I, a pure soul, will never fall for your attempts to seduce me.
Now then, it is about time to finish you off.
I will end it quickly in an instant, so that you do not feel pain...
Time to take you down a peg!
Are you another one that is fallen for my manliness?
I do not have a particular type of girl I like.
And my attack is not working.
Change Mr. Cursey 2 to electric power!
You are a real pain, are not you?
With my Self-Strengthening, I can dodge that easily!
Cotton is sucking up the water, and getting heavy!
So this is what it takes to be a candidate in the S Class Wizard Exam?
I am at a loss when I have two of you approaching me so fervently...
I guess it is my time to be popular, yes?
Honestly, this might be a problem.
You have been doing this shtick on purpose, have not you?
Sorry to make you wait, everyone!
With the three of us, we can handle this somehow!
The three of you can what?
You are going to fight me three on one?
Being confessed to by three girls at the same time!
Seriously, how popular am I all of a sudden?
And I am a manly man, as you can see!
A serious relationship should be one on one!
So which one of you is it going to be?
I am not sad at all!
I knew you were going to say that!
Using my hair and his hair, I can change bodies at will!
And on myself, Self-Strengthen with mist!
Now I am impervious to all physical and secondary attacks!
We figured this might happen, so Fried placed a number around earlier.
This is a rune trap that makes it impossible to use magic.
When it comes to piling on, leave that to us!
Explosion on the right and storm on my left!
My second loss in a row?
Looks like we just got another promotion-pero.
We have got an even better chance of moving up-pero!
They are happy because their comrade got defeated?
They are a Dark Guild, after all.
We cannot understand how they think.
It is a little too soon to be bending knee to me after the boasting you just did.
He got hit by that magic earlier!
To think there would be monsters like this in the world...
I have got a long way to go.
What the hell are you saying?!
You have done well, Laxus fellow.
You cannot let yourself be hit by that!
It is okay to get pissed...
That is all of my magic power.
He gave his magic power to Natsu?
I heard he got sick from it the last time...
He took that blow without any magic power at all!
That is just how much he wanted to give Natsu-san his magic power?
It are not about bein' strong or weak.
Who was it that got hurt?
It is got to be someone with the mark of the guild, damn it!
It is the guild that will pay him back for the pain suffered by the guild!
A fusion of flame and lightning.
Is not that acting a little bit too cool for you, Natsu?
It are not acting, you know.
It is not fair that I cannot have something similar.
If you had lightning powers, Happy, would not you just be a Flying Lightning Cat?
That is like, so totally cool!
It is something that Lily, who is scared of lightning, could never handle...
This way, my character's uniqueness is secure!
Oh, so that is what you are worried about...
